channel.title: Arcade
channel.description: PunBB had an arcade tab which players accounts were connected to the arcade and held a high scores system. I request.

item.title: Arcade
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:59, topic:518589”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=636854.msg4327304#msg4327304 date=1373150528]

[quote author=Lin link=topic=636854.msg4327268#msg4327268 date=1373145142]

[quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=636854.msg4327221#msg4327221 date=1373140635]

so this was suggested nearly 2 months ago with much community support and nothing has been done

is there even a point to this section?
[/quote]The forum is run by careless staff. Nobody with power wants to actually make a change here. There is no point. Demote Tom, Taharok, and a large amount of global moderators. Promote some new people who can actually bring about change, but make sure they’re none of the global moderators we have now.

Taharok is a good admin, and is busy a lot of the time.

But yes, DEMOTE TOM.
[/quote]No, his inactivity and not listening to the community makes him a bad admin. He’s smart and could run this forum if he wanted to, but his focus is elsewhere and he shouldn’t be admin.

Explain how he doesn’t listen to the community?
[/quote]When is the last time a real change was made? All that has been done is a couple board changes and promotions. This section is filled with topics and none of the ideas are being pursued. Shitty administration. I really like Taharok and really enjoy discussing things with him, but he’s a bad administrator for this community. Tom is worse because he blatantly made community member a thing with no guidelines and didn’t stick with anything. All it did was encourage elitism and worked against what the staff was trying to. He gave it to none of the members that really deserved it, which shows he is careless, lazy, and ignorant. I don’t know about you, but those don’t sound like qualities I want in a person running a forum.[/quote]

People who don’t understand a situation are way too quick to judge it.

I’m still on board for implementing an arcade if we start getting some games submitted for it.

Read full topic

item.title: Arcade
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:

[quote=“Lin, post:59, topic:518589”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=636854.msg4327304#msg4327304 date=1373150528]

[quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=636854.msg4327221#msg4327221 date=1373140635]

so this was suggested nearly 2 months ago with much community support and nothing has been done

is there even a point to this section?
[/quote]The forum is run by careless staff. Nobody with power wants to actually make a change here. There is no point. Demote Tom, Taharok, and a large amount of global moderators. Promote some new people who can actually bring about change, but make sure they’re none of the global moderators we have now.

Taharok is a good admin, and is busy a lot of the time.

But yes, DEMOTE TOM.
[/quote]No, his inactivity and not listening to the community makes him a bad admin. He’s smart and could run this forum if he wanted to, but his focus is elsewhere and he shouldn’t be admin.

Explain how he doesn’t listen to the community?
[/quote]When is the last time a real change was made? All that has been done is a couple board changes and promotions. This section is filled with topics and none of the ideas are being pursued. Shitty administration. I really like Taharok and really enjoy discussing things with him, but he’s a bad administrator for this community. Tom is worse because he blatantly made community member a thing with no guidelines and didn’t stick with anything. All it did was encourage elitism and worked against what the staff was trying to. He gave it to none of the members that really deserved it, which shows he is careless, lazy, and ignorant. I don’t know about you, but those don’t sound like qualities I want in a person running a forum.[/quote]

I know when Taharok was first promoted there were some good changes going on, and we had the suggestion board which I really liked. I think he’s just on a bad schedule atm, I guess we’ll see.

Read full topic

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:57, topic:518589”][quote author=Lin link=topic=636854.msg4327268#msg4327268 date=1373145142]

so this was suggested nearly 2 months ago with much community support and nothing has been done

is there even a point to this section?
[/quote]The forum is run by careless staff. Nobody with power wants to actually make a change here. There is no point. Demote Tom, Taharok, and a large amount of global moderators. Promote some new people who can actually bring about change, but make sure they’re none of the global moderators we have now.

Taharok is a good admin, and is busy a lot of the time.

But yes, DEMOTE TOM.
[/quote]No, his inactivity and not listening to the community makes him a bad admin. He’s smart and could run this forum if he wanted to, but his focus is elsewhere and he shouldn’t be admin.

Explain how he doesn’t listen to the community?[/quote]When is the last time a real change was made? All that has been done is a couple board changes and promotions. This section is filled with topics and none of the ideas are being pursued. Shitty administration. I really like Taharok and really enjoy discussing things with him, but he’s a bad administrator for this community. Tom is worse because he blatantly made community member a thing with no guidelines and didn’t stick with anything. All it did was encourage elitism and worked against what the staff was trying to. He gave it to none of the members that really deserved it, which shows he is careless, lazy, and ignorant. I don’t know about you, but those don’t sound like qualities I want in a person running a forum.

item.title: Arcade
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Loveandpower:

I wonder if 18+ arcade games is legal by adsense

I bet you do

[quote=“Taharok, post:24, topic:518589”]I would love to implement something like this, but with community-developed games. I was considering adding something like this a while back, but simply haven’t. I’d be willing to reconsider it if we rekindle the gamedev side of this community.

Ie: play as many games as you want, but as many as the community has developed. Could have an arcade with 3 games or 30 games. Gives people a nice incentive to do game development, get feedback on their efforts, and allows the community members to have fun in the process. Seems like a good plan to me.

Thoughts?[/quote]
Would the arcade section be cut up based on what the game is made in?
Ex: Sections for Unity, Flash, Java, HTML5/Javascript/Etc, and so on?

Read full topic
